tasks.description: Configure tracing-subscriber for colored, structured output on stdout.
Implement spans for logical sections (e.g. startup, request handling).
Ensure ANSI codes are correctly handled (enabled for tty, disabled for file/no-tty).
Review and improve existing log messages for clarity and consistency.

github_issue.title: Enhance Logging Visuals and Structure
github_issue.body:
Part of #54

## Tasks
- [ ] Configure tracing-subscriber for colored, structured output on stdout.
- [ ] Implement spans for logical sections (e.g. startup, request handling).
- [ ] Ensure ANSI codes are correctly handled (enabled for tty, disabled for file/no-tty).
- [ ] Review and improve existing log messages for clarity and consistency.

issues.title: Verify and Tune Auto Batch Size Calculations

tasks.description: Validate saturating_sub usage prevents underflow but might mask configuration errors.
Check if mimi_mb estimate is accurate.
Add memory usage tracking/metrics during runtime to validate static estimates.
Consider making per_batch_item_mb dynamic based on model/dtype.
Create detailed documentation for VRAM and batch size calculations (math and constants).

github_issue.title: Verify and Tune Auto Batch Size Calculations
github_issue.body:
Part of #54

## Tasks
- [ ] Review DEFAULT_VRAM_RESERVED_MB and other constants.
- [ ] Validate saturating_sub usage prevents underflow but might mask configuration errors.
- [ ] Check if mimi_mb estimate is accurate.
- [ ] Add memory usage tracking/metrics during runtime to validate static estimates.
- [ ] Consider making per_batch_item_mb dynamic based on model/dtype.
- [ ] Create detailed documentation for VRAM and batch size calculations (math and constants).

tasks.description: Profile startup and inference loop to identify bottlenecks.
Check for unnecessary data copying or cloning.

github_issue.title: Performance Analysis and Optimization
github_issue.body:
Part of #54

## Tasks
- [ ] Profile startup and inference loop to identify bottlenecks.
- [ ] Investigate optimization flags (LTO, codegen-units).
- [ ] Analyze locking granularity (e.g. Arc<Mutex> usage).
- [ ] Check for unnecessary data copying or cloning.
